article.title: Verizon to Support High-Performance Computing Modernization
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Verizon Business Services, Ashburn, Virginia, was awarded a firm-fixed-price, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity sole-source contract for Defense Research and Engineering Network II telecommunication services for the High Performance Computing Modernization Program Office. The total value of this action is $40,787,599. Defense Information Technology Contracting Organization, Scott Air Force Base, Illinois, is the contracting activity.
